mapper.insert: insert into sys_user_permission (user_id, permission_id, enable_, remark_, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{permissionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update sys_user_permission set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, permission_id = #{permissionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, enable_ = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark_ = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id_, user_id, permission_id, enable_, remark_, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by from sys_user_permission where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id_, user_id, permission_id, enable_, remark_, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by from sys_user_permission
